biocontainers.name: damidseq_pipeline
biocontainers.summary: An automated pipeline for processing damid sequencing datasets

biotools.summary: Single script that automatically handles sequence alignment, read extension, binned counts, normalisation, pseudocount addition and final ratio file generation.
